titles.title: Providing for the consideration of the resolution (H. Res. 111) establishing a Select Committee on POW and MIA Affairs.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.
Motion to Discharge Committee filed by Mr. Tancredo. Petition No: 110-11. (Discharge petition text with signatures.)

bill.summary:
6/4/2008--Introduced.
Sets forth the rule for consideration of H.Res. 111 (establishing a Select Committee on POW and MIA Affairs).
